Add columns for race/ethnicity and sex

Source: R/add_race_sex.R
add_race_sex.Rd

Add variables race and sex from record to a data frame, using id is the join-by variable.

add_race_sex(dframe, ..., record = NULL)

Arguments

dframe

data frame
...

not used, forces later arguments to be used by name
record

data frame of student attributes, default midfieldstudents

Value

Data frame with the following properties:

  • Rows are not modified

  • Columns race and sex are added

  • Data frame attributes tbl or data.table are preserved

  • Grouping structures are not preserved

Details

Existing variables with the same names, if any, are overwritten.

Examples
